~ start
Guard: Halt! State your business in these lands.
- I'm just passing through
	Guard: Very well. Watch yourself - bandits have been spotted nearby.
	Guard: Safe travels, stranger.
	=> END
- I'm looking for work
	Guard: Hmm. Speak to the Captain at the barracks if you're serious.
	Guard: We can always use capable fighters.
	=> END
- That's none of your concern
	Guard: Watch your tone! I have half a mind to turn you away.
	Guard: ...Fine. Move along, but don't cause trouble.
	=> END
